## Rental Car Use made Simple
With the use of this app, one can easily navigate through their preferred rental car choices. 
```{r}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
car.options <- select(mpg, manufacturer, model, year, cty, hwy, class)
head(car.options) 
```

--- .custom
